DataElement.preferredName: Practice-Based Research Collaborative in Evidence-Based Dentistry Patient Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria Type
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A network of dental practices that will establish the infrastructure to perform a wide variety of oral health research studies in Idaho, Montana, Oregon, Utah and Washington. A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary. Elements of a personal medical history which are necessary to allow an individual to participate in a specific clinical trial. Type; a subdivision of a particular kind of thing.

Elements of a personal medical history which are necessary to allow an individual to participate in a specific clinical trial.

Property.preferredDefinition: Elements of a personal medical history which are necessary to allow an individual to participate in a specific clinical trial.

Concepts.definition: Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

ValueDomain.preferredName: Practice-Based Research Collaborative in Evidence-Based Dentistry Patient Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria Type
ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Type; a subdivision of a particular kind of thing.

PermissibleValues.value: Has the patient abstained from smoking, eating (including chewing gum) or drinking (except water), brushing teeth or using mouthwash for at least 1 hour?
